document_data.name: Urquirsh
document_data.mainbody: '''Urquirsh''' were a foul species of [[aberration]]s from the [[Far Realm]] that the [[kaorti]] utilized as living weapons.
document_data.Description: Urquirsh were small, stinking sacs of flesh, entrails, and tubes suspended by long, spidery legs. It was they that produced the resin that the kaorti used as armor.
document_data.Personality: Urquirsh were almost completely mindless, but were devoted to their kaorti masters.
document_data.Abilities: Urquirsh were highly nimble, as if under the ''[[freedom of movement]]'' spell at all times, and, as long as it lived, it was innately tied to the Far Realm. Urquirsh formed small rifts to their home plane periodically, and additionally used these rifts to procure their natural weapons. However, when cut off from their home plane, they were functionally harmless. Their only other defenses were a sharp stench that radiated from their bodies, able to sicken their enemies, and small claws. Possessing no eyes, they were also immune to any gaze attacks or effects that relied on sight.

Combat.Relationships: Urquirsh were often brought from the Far Realm by [[kaorti]], who used the creatures for the resin they produced and for their combat capabilities.
